title: Did Jared Kushner’s Task Force Scrap Nationwide COVID-19 Testing Over Politics?
subtitle: The pandemic response team led by Kushner, senior adviser to U.S. President Donald Trump, reportedly did not want to extend help to blue states.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The COVID-19 pandemic response team organized by Jared Kushner scrapped a federal government-led national testing plan because the virus had hit Democratic states hardest, according to a member of the task force, and helping blue states would be a political disadvantage, according to a July 2020 report.
